snippet.title: Spyrazoid Puzzle - Rounds 1-10 Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Introducing Spyrazoid, a minimalist puzzle game available on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyrazoid/id1585455563

In Spyrazoid Puzzle, the goal is simple: Spin the hexagons until the circles all land on a spot of matching color.  For boards with 2 colors it might come easy, but by the time you get to 6 colors, good luck!  And with 180 pre-programmed boards and infinite randomly-generated boards, the fun never ends.  How many rounds can you complete?

00:00 - Round 1
00:47 - Round 2
01:26 - Round 3
01:55 - Round 4
02:27 - Round 5
03:10 - Round 6
04:13 - Round 7
05:00 - Round 8
05:50 - Round 9
06:30 - Round 10

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyrazoid/?mode=puzzle

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyrazoid #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
